meanings.def: (especially in the past) a person on a ship who attacks other ships at sea in order to steal from them
examples: There were reports that a pirate ship had come looking for treasure in the cove.

meanings.def: a person who makes illegal copies of books, computer programs, etc., in order to sell them
a person or an organization that broadcasts illegally
to copy and use or sell somebody’s work or a product without permission and without having the right to do so
examples: Jones was accused of having pirated the scientist’s work.
